ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I’ve used this brand for quite a while, and I’m sleeping much better.  According to my Apple Watch, I’m also getting much more REM sleep than before I started using it.  The pills are a pleasant flavor and dissolve very quickly, which makes them effective much quicker than other brands. The quick-dissolve has another added benefit —there is no need for a drink.  They readily dissolve on your tongue, so, should you awaken in the night and need another pill, you needn’t even get out of bed for a drink. Therefore, it’s much easier to get back to sleep.  I have been on many prescription sleep aids, and I’ve found that this natural alternative works just as well and is likely much-healthier for me.  The effect seems to last about 6-8 hours for me.  I would definitely recommend this brand over others I’ve tried and certainly before trying a prescription medication.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I am a frequent user of melatonin. I usually purchase higher mg gummies and based on the product,  I am out like a light throughout the night, sleeping peacefully with no side effects like feeling grogginess. I decided to give these a shot, since I like quick dissolve tablets. Plus the the price and mg were right, and they have positive reviews. I've taken them for about a week now, but I am still undecided about the effectiveness.First, I don't care for the taste. I thought they would be more berry flavored, but the flavored seems more bitter and off putting than I would like. They dissolve okay, but take longer to dissolve than I expected. The size and option to break pills is a plus.These do put me to sleep within 15-20 minutes of taking them; however,  I noticed that I don't stay sleep throughout the night. I usually wake up around 4 am. I thought it was because I was only taking 1 pill per the instructions, so I started taking 2, but still not sleeping throughout the night. Maybe my body needs to get use to these, not sure but boy waking up earlier than I want annoying - especially when I am used to sleeping up to 7 hours straight using other products. I don't feel groggy when waking, but I am definitely tired sometimes because my body isn't getting my typical hours of sleep.Hopefully the longer I take these, the better they will work to keep me asleep, but we will see. They are worth a try.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: The sealed bottle I received has only 125 tablets, not 180 as indicated in the description.Update: The seller offered a complete refund for their mistake. I tried the product and it works as advertised.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: At 20mg per tablet, these quick-dissolving wonders pack a powerful punch. The tablets are cleverly scored, allowing you to easily snap them in half for a gentler 10mg dose. This flexibility is amazing - I started with the smaller dose and gradually increased based on my needs. And guess what? It works! I now fall asleep faster, and my sleep feels deeper and more restful.Value for Money: With 180 tablets per bottle, this product offers a massive amount of melatonin for a surprisingly affordable price. I'm talking months of restful nights without breaking the bank! Compared to other brands I've tried, Nature's Perfect Night delivers exceptional value. The tablets are sugar-free, vegan, and gluten-free, making them suitable for various dietary needs.Bonus Points: The natural mixed berry flavor? It's pleasant! No chalky aftertaste here - just a gentle sweetness that dissolves quickly on the tongue. Plus, the convenience of quick-dissolving tablets is amazing. No need for water, just pop it in your mouth and drift off peacefully.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I'm not sure how much melatonin is too much melatonin.  Your body produces less than 1 mg per day and most experts recommend no more than 10 mg a day as a supplement, so 20 mg may be too much.  But.  I have taken up to 40 mg a day with no side effects other than unusually vivid dreams (a phenom noted by other high-dosage users).  You should start off by seeking your doctor's advice, then ramp up slowly from one or two mg a night.  The effect can be powerful, so be cautious and act slowly.  A good night's sleep is a wonderful thing, but you definitely don't want to go 'over center.' with this drug.

ReviewContent: It’s been a game changer for helping me fall asleep quicker and stay asleep. It dissolves in your mouth or can be crunched—it’s not a regular hard pill, which is useful if you want to crush it up and put it in something, especially for a child. The dosage is high—note that 20mg is about the highest recommended—so these pills are helpfully designed to easily break in half if you want to take only 10mg. (And, if you do that, the 180 pill bottle will last you almost a whole year.)One “side effect” from experience has been that it results in more vivid dreams and dream recall after waking up.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: People take melatonin for health reasons (vs just sleep)--especially when it involves dosages greater than 5-10 mg.So we don't want other things in it that are there to make it "taste better", like artificial sweeteners.And artificial sweeteners *do* raise blood sugar.I personally know people who have tested this with continuous blood glucose meters that they wear.  Even a stevia soda (e.g. Zevia) can raise blood sugar by 20 points.In any case, sucralose is basically chlorinated sugar in order to render it unrecognizable as a sugar to the body.  Does this sound like a healthy thing to you?So I'm going to consume this product (because I'm cheap and probably one bottle won't do lasting damage) and then I'm going to find a brand that doesn't pollute their own product and use that for the long term.One more thing: at 20 mg dosages or more, people are probably doing "high-dose melatonin" (HDM) for therapies like preventing cancer or the like.We typically don't CARE about taste. We are going for a specific result and just need certain dosages.So I recommend eliminating the need to make them chewable or tasty. The "juice isn't worth the squeeze."Further, sucralose has a nasty aftertaste. So if you are determined to sweeten your product, its a bad choice.Better to use monkfruit or something like that if your'e going to sweeten something up and make someone increase their sugars.At least that's a naturally occurring product whereas sucralose is engineered in a lab.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Ahh, 2020 (annnnd 2021). Not great years for sleep. So, I've taken to testing just about every sleep aid Amazon will put up for review. Melatonin is one of my favorites so far. So I've tested this Nature's Perfect Night brand Melatonin quick dissolve tab. At time of review a bottle of 180 tablets are $14.99 making a dose around 8 cents and a bottle that can last you 180 days (or more if you split the tablets).These are small "berry" flavored tablets that you allow to melt in the mouth (to allow quicker absorption). They are a bit grainy and not the best tasting but they aren't terrible. Now usually a minimum of 5mg works best for me, this is 4x that. Did it work faster than a 5mg? No, I don't believe it does but it might hit a little heavier than just 5. If you get less than 8 hours you might feel a little groggy if you're not used to a high dose (I was just a little but you can always split a tab for less mg). It works exactly as it should and this bottle is a great value for as many as you get.
ReviewTitle: Good value on a high dose melatonin tab

ReviewContent: I’ve used this brand for quite a while, and I’m sleeping much better.  According to my Apple Watch, I’m also getting much more REM sleep than before I started using it.  The pills are a pleasant flavor and dissolve very quickly, which makes them effective much quicker than other brands. The quick-dissolve has another added benefit —there is no need for a drink.  They readily dissolve on your tongue, so, should you awaken in the night and need another pill, you needn’t even get out of bed for a drink. Therefore, it’s much easier to get back to sleep.  I have been on many prescription sleep aids, and I’ve found that this natural alternative works just as well and is likely much-healthier for me.  The effect seems to last about 6-8 hours for me.  I would definitely recommend this brand over others I’ve tried and certainly before trying a prescription medication.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I am a frequent user of melatonin. I usually purchase higher mg gummies and based on the product,  I am out like a light throughout the night, sleeping peacefully with no side effects like feeling grogginess. I decided to give these a shot, since I like quick dissolve tablets. Plus the the price and mg were right, and they have positive reviews. I've taken them for about a week now, but I am still undecided about the effectiveness.First, I don't care for the taste. I thought they would be more berry flavored, but the flavored seems more bitter and off putting than I would like. They dissolve okay, but take longer to dissolve than I expected. The size and option to break pills is a plus.These do put me to sleep within 15-20 minutes of taking them; however,  I noticed that I don't stay sleep throughout the night. I usually wake up around 4 am. I thought it was because I was only taking 1 pill per the instructions, so I started taking 2, but still not sleeping throughout the night. Maybe my body needs to get use to these, not sure but boy waking up earlier than I want annoying - especially when I am used to sleeping up to 7 hours straight using other products. I don't feel groggy when waking, but I am definitely tired sometimes because my body isn't getting my typical hours of sleep.Hopefully the longer I take these, the better they will work to keep me asleep, but we will see. They are worth a try.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: The sealed bottle I received has only 125 tablets, not 180 as indicated in the description.Update: The seller offered a complete refund for their mistake. I tried the product and it works as advertised.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: At 20mg per tablet, these quick-dissolving wonders pack a powerful punch. The tablets are cleverly scored, allowing you to easily snap them in half for a gentler 10mg dose. This flexibility is amazing - I started with the smaller dose and gradually increased based on my needs. And guess what? It works! I now fall asleep faster, and my sleep feels deeper and more restful.Value for Money: With 180 tablets per bottle, this product offers a massive amount of melatonin for a surprisingly affordable price. I'm talking months of restful nights without breaking the bank! Compared to other brands I've tried, Nature's Perfect Night delivers exceptional value. The tablets are sugar-free, vegan, and gluten-free, making them suitable for various dietary needs.Bonus Points: The natural mixed berry flavor? It's pleasant! No chalky aftertaste here - just a gentle sweetness that dissolves quickly on the tongue. Plus, the convenience of quick-dissolving tablets is amazing. No need for water, just pop it in your mouth and drift off peacefully.

I think this pill works different with different people. I would recommend them but idk if it would work for everyone. ALSO the flavor is ahhh okay. ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I'm not sure how much melatonin is too much melatonin.  Your body produces less than 1 mg per day and most experts recommend no more than 10 mg a day as a supplement, so 20 mg may be too much.  But.  I have taken up to 40 mg a day with no side effects other than unusually vivid dreams (a phenom noted by other high-dosage users).  You should start off by seeking your doctor's advice, then ramp up slowly from one or two mg a night.  The effect can be powerful, so be cautious and act slowly.  A good night's sleep is a wonderful thing, but you definitely don't want to go 'over center.' with this drug.

ReviewContent: It’s been a game changer for helping me fall asleep quicker and stay asleep. It dissolves in your mouth or can be crunched—it’s not a regular hard pill, which is useful if you want to crush it up and put it in something, especially for a child. The dosage is high—note that 20mg is about the highest recommended—so these pills are helpfully designed to easily break in half if you want to take only 10mg. (And, if you do that, the 180 pill bottle will last you almost a whole year.)One “side effect” from experience has been that it results in more vivid dreams and dream recall after waking up.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: People take melatonin for health reasons (vs just sleep)--especially when it involves dosages greater than 5-10 mg.So we don't want other things in it that are there to make it "taste better", like artificial sweeteners.And artificial sweeteners *do* raise blood sugar.I personally know people who have tested this with continuous blood glucose meters that they wear.  Even a stevia soda (e.g. Zevia) can raise blood sugar by 20 points.In any case, sucralose is basically chlorinated sugar in order to render it unrecognizable as a sugar to the body.  Does this sound like a healthy thing to you?So I'm going to consume this product (because I'm cheap and probably one bottle won't do lasting damage) and then I'm going to find a brand that doesn't pollute their own product and use that for the long term.One more thing: at 20 mg dosages or more, people are probably doing "high-dose melatonin" (HDM) for therapies like preventing cancer or the like.We typically don't CARE about taste. We are going for a specific result and just need certain dosages.So I recommend eliminating the need to make them chewable or tasty. The "juice isn't worth the squeeze."Further, sucralose has a nasty aftertaste. So if you are determined to sweeten your product, its a bad choice.Better to use monkfruit or something like that if your'e going to sweeten something up and make someone increase their sugars.At least that's a naturally occurring product whereas sucralose is engineered in a lab.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Ahh, 2020 (annnnd 2021). Not great years for sleep. So, I've taken to testing just about every sleep aid Amazon will put up for review. Melatonin is one of my favorites so far. So I've tested this Nature's Perfect Night brand Melatonin quick dissolve tab. At time of review a bottle of 180 tablets are $14.99 making a dose around 8 cents and a bottle that can last you 180 days (or more if you split the tablets).These are small "berry" flavored tablets that you allow to melt in the mouth (to allow quicker absorption). They are a bit grainy and not the best tasting but they aren't terrible. Now usually a minimum of 5mg works best for me, this is 4x that. Did it work faster than a 5mg? No, I don't believe it does but it might hit a little heavier than just 5. If you get less than 8 hours you might feel a little groggy if you're not used to a high dose (I was just a little but you can always split a tab for less mg). It works exactly as it should and this bottle is a great value for as many as you get.
ReviewTitle: Good value on a high dose melatonin tab

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size

The pills are a pleasant flavor and dissolve very quickly, which makes them effective much quicker than other brands. The quick-dissolve has another added benefit —there is no need for a drink.  They readily dissolve on your tongue, so, should you awaken in the night and need another pill, you needn’t even get out of bed for a drink. Therefore, it’s much easier to get back to sleep.  I have been on many prescription sleep aids, and I’ve found that this natural alternative works just as well and is likely much-healthier for me.  The effect seems to last about 6-8 hours for me.  I would definitely recommend this brand over others I’ve tried and certainly before trying a prescription medication.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I'm not sure how much melatonin is too much melatonin.  Your body produces less than 1 mg per day and most experts recommend no more than 10 mg a day as a supplement, so 20 mg may be too much.  But.  I have taken up to 40 mg a day with no side effects other than unusually vivid dreams (a phenom noted by other high-dosage users).  You should start off by seeking your doctor's advice, then ramp up slowly from one or two mg a night.  The effect can be powerful, so be cautious and act slowly.  A good night's sleep is a wonderful thing, but you definitely don't want to go 'over center.' with this drug.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Ahh, 2020 (annnnd 2021). Not great years for sleep. So, I've taken to testing just about every sleep aid Amazon will put up for review. Melatonin is one of my favorites so far. So I've tested this Nature's Perfect Night brand Melatonin quick dissolve tab. At time of review a bottle of 180 tablets are $14.99 making a dose around 8 cents and a bottle that can last you 180 days (or more if you split the tablets).These are small "berry" flavored tablets that you allow to melt in the mouth (to allow quicker absorption). They are a bit grainy and not the best tasting but they aren't terrible. Now usually a minimum of 5mg works best for me, this is 4x that. Did it work faster than a 5mg? No, I don't believe it does but it might hit a little heavier than just 5. If you get less than 8 hours you might feel a little groggy if you're not used to a high dose (I was just a little but you can always split a tab for less mg). It works exactly as it should and this bottle is a great value for as many as you get.

ReviewContent: I’ve used this brand for quite a while, and I’m sleeping much better.  According to my Apple Watch, I’m also getting much more REM sleep than before I started using it.  The pills are a pleasant flavor and dissolve very quickly, which makes them effective much quicker than other brands. The quick-dissolve has another added benefit —there is no need for a drink.  They readily dissolve on your tongue, so, should you awaken in the night and need another pill, you needn’t even get out of bed for a drink. Therefore, it’s much easier to get back to sleep.  I have been on many prescription sleep aids, and I’ve found that this natural alternative works just as well and is likely much-healthier for me.  The effect seems to last about 6-8 hours for me.  I would definitely recommend this brand over others I’ve tried and certainly before trying a prescription medication.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I'm not sure how much melatonin is too much melatonin.  Your body produces less than 1 mg per day and most experts recommend no more than 10 mg a day as a supplement, so 20 mg may be too much.  But.  I have taken up to 40 mg a day with no side effects other than unusually vivid dreams (a phenom noted by other high-dosage users).  You should start off by seeking your doctor's advice, then ramp up slowly from one or two mg a night.  The effect can be powerful, so be cautious and act slowly.  A good night's sleep is a wonderful thing, but you definitely don't want to go 'over center.' with this drug.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Ahh, 2020 (annnnd 2021). Not great years for sleep. So, I've taken to testing just about every sleep aid Amazon will put up for review. Melatonin is one of my favorites so far. So I've tested this Nature's Perfect Night brand Melatonin quick dissolve tab. At time of review a bottle of 180 tablets are $14.99 making a dose around 8 cents and a bottle that can last you 180 days (or more if you split the tablets).These are small "berry" flavored tablets that you allow to melt in the mouth (to allow quicker absorption). They are a bit grainy and not the best tasting but they aren't terrible. Now usually a minimum of 5mg works best for me, this is 4x that. Did it work faster than a 5mg? No, I don't believe it does but it might hit a little heavier than just 5. If you get less than 8 hours you might feel a little groggy if you're not used to a high dose (I was just a little but you can always split a tab for less mg). It works exactly as it should and this bottle is a great value for as many as you get.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: These Nature’s Perfect Night Melatonin 20mg Quick Dissolve Tablets work quite well. I've suffered from insomnia due to PTSD for many years, and I'd rather take melatonin than a prescription. My preferred dosage is anywhere from 3 to 5 mg, and I can easily cut/break these into 4ths. Sometimes, people take large doses, but it can really have an opposite effect. With Melatonin, often times, less is more.It only takes a few seconds for them to dissolve. The taste is sweet and fruity, and they help me get a better night's sleep.I usually have to take it about an hour before bedtime, because it takes my body longer for medications to work. Once it kicks in, there's not much I can do except go to sleep.You get a lot for your money, and this big bottle will last a long time. I would recommend them to anyone who suffers from insomnia.
ReviewTitle: Easy to dissolve and works well. Sometimes, less is more...

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Review for: Nature’s Perfect Night | Melatonin 20 MG | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |This is a pretty large dose of melatonin and more than I am used to taking. I have found that it does not make me drowsy in the morning and most nights it seems to make me sleep better, but not every night. I am not sure if this dose makes me sleep better than a smaller dose either.The pills are easy to take, you let them dissolve in your mouth. The taste is berry flavored and not unpleasant.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I've been using a melatonin suppliment for years to help me sleep. These tablets are 20 mg, which is a high dose for me. I break them in half and they work great. Definitely recommended.

ReviewContent: I slept the longest I have in quite some time.  Next morning I can not keep my eyes open, they burn also. Not sleepy, burning eyes very bad.  I have to keep shaking my head to feel as if I can focus. I am not having issues with focus just feels that way.  Every 2 or 3 seconds I have to shake my head to relieve the feeling.  Now I am getting a headache from all the head shaking. So I have to see how long this goes on I have been awake 2 hrs.. If this is an all day thing I will not continue to take this even though I slept better than I have in a long time.  I can't get much done.  Hopefully this is a short term affect. I may try taking a little off and try to get closer to 15mlg. Other than that slept like a baby.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I've tried many many melatonin pills,including gummies. I needed some for back to school since I have such a hard time falling to sleep. Instead of going to the store I decided to buy some from Amazon. I landed on these because I got more pills for less money. Some of the reviews impressed me but I was still worried that I wouldn't like them. I still ordered them anyway. Im so glad i did. Actually wow, like wow! I've used these for a week and I swear by 9 I'm out. I've never slept better in my life! I LOVE THEM! Gonna repurchase! ONE THING I WOULD SAY - my littler siblings have hard time sleeping too so I split a pill for them. (they eat usually the gummy ones) For them it took a couple days for them to adjust. For the first couple of nights they did not sleep well, honestly worse. They stayed up all night. But after a couple days it worked on them like me. I think this pill works different with different people. I would recommend them but idk if it would work for everyone. ALSO the flavor is ahhh okay. I just chewed them quickly and swallowed them but they don't taste that bad, just very strong grape.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I am a frequent user of melatonin. I usually purchase higher mg gummies and based on the product,  I am out like a light throughout the night, sleeping peacefully with no side effects like feeling grogginess. I decided to give these a shot, since I like quick dissolve tablets. Plus the the price and mg were right, and they have positive reviews. I've taken them for about a week now, but I am still undecided about the effectiveness.First, I don't care for the taste. I thought they would be more berry flavored, but the flavored seems more bitter and off putting than I would like. They dissolve okay, but take longer to dissolve than I expected. The size and option to break pills is a plus.These do put me to sleep within 15-20 minutes of taking them; however,  I noticed that I don't stay sleep throughout the night. I usually wake up around 4 am. I thought it was because I was only taking 1 pill per the instructions, so I started taking 2, but still not sleeping throughout the night. Maybe my body needs to get use to these, not sure but boy waking up earlier than I want annoying - especially when I am used to sleeping up to 7 hours straight using other products. I don't feel groggy when waking, but I am definitely tired sometimes because my body isn't getting my typical hours of sleep.Hopefully the longer I take these, the better they will work to keep me asleep, but we will see. They are worth a try.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: They worked fine at the beginning and knocked me out in about an hour. A few days later it takes two hours (taking 5 x 20 = 100mg) and I could not say if the pills are hitting me or falling asleep naturally.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I take melatonin often to get a good nights sleep. Several reasons from being a toss and turner, to sometimes I'm just too active minded to 'shut down' to...well a snoring significant other. Often I take 10 mg type, but decided to give this a try cause it was quick dissolving and I find the pill kind tends to take awhile to kick in so I thought I would try one that seems to hit the system faster,I did get the same effect I would from taking a melatonin but it just didn't seem to be '20 mg' worth. The 10 mg I take regularly after about half hour I often am dozing off. This one however I almost barely felt much of any assisted sleepyness.I took it for about a week and given some nights did seem to assist me more than others but still on a very mild level (as if I took a 1-5 mg one) as opposed to a 20!Now I'm no expert on melatonin but I figured more MG meant deeper more assisted sleep. I honestly felt no major difference (in fact less of an impact) than what I already took.So maybe its mislabeled or perhaps the dissolving factor has the opposite effect? I dont know. But I will say it DID assist in being drowsy however, on nights I was 'wired' awake, I could have gone without even feeling a thing from them, while others , lower MG dosage after about an hour I struggle to keep my eyes open.Now the flavor, pretty tasty! No complaints there. And they are very small and dissolve almost immediately although I tend to chew them.Maybe since I take melatonin as a regular I may have a slight tempered effect, I'm not sure. Give them a try if you never have taken melatonin, perhaps they will work better for you, but as it stands, for me, not much help from a low dose kind.
ReviewTitle: Didn't seem to work for being 20mg

ReviewContent: I’ve been up twice nights in a row with no sleep. This doesn’t seem to help at all. I just toss and turn . Not crazy about the ingredients either.  I like natural stuff . I should have paid attention. I took 2 last night , got up and felt off. Then had an upset stomach if you know what I mean. The bathroom was my friend all morning.   What works for one person doesn’t always work for the other I guess. This morning again upset stomach. I only took one last night.
ReviewTitle: Hasn’t done a thing for me

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: People take melatonin for health reasons (vs just sleep)--especially when it involves dosages greater than 5-10 mg.So we don't want other things in it that are there to make it "taste better", like artificial sweeteners.And artificial sweeteners *do* raise blood sugar.I personally know people who have tested this with continuous blood glucose meters that they wear.  Even a stevia soda (e.g. Zevia) can raise blood sugar by 20 points.In any case, sucralose is basically chlorinated sugar in order to render it unrecognizable as a sugar to the body.  Does this sound like a healthy thing to you?So I'm going to consume this product (because I'm cheap and probably one bottle won't do lasting damage) and then I'm going to find a brand that doesn't pollute their own product and use that for the long term.One more thing: at 20 mg dosages or more, people are probably doing "high-dose melatonin" (HDM) for therapies like preventing cancer or the like.We typically don't CARE about taste. We are going for a specific result and just need certain dosages.So I recommend eliminating the need to make them chewable or tasty. The "juice isn't worth the squeeze."Further, sucralose has a nasty aftertaste. So if you are determined to sweeten your product, its a bad choice.Better to use monkfruit or something like that if your'e going to sweeten something up and make someone increase their sugars.At least that's a naturally occurring product whereas sucralose is engineered in a lab.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: These do work, however, these are supposed to be mixed berry flavor, they tast like pure acid. Taste like vomit, did not dissolve as it should have, had to swallow whole.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Worked good, but had bad dreams, nightmares.  Terrifying ones that seemed realistic.  Not going to try again.  Been taking melatonin quick dissolve for many years.  No others give me dreams like these did

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Did not help me sleep. Put me in a strange mode where I was awake, felt tired, but could not sleep. Another product that should never be taken with prescription meds

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I've been taking non disposable Spring Valley 10 mg melatonin for years. I have to take 1-2 of these 20 mg chewable to have the same effect. I gave it 2 stars for the chewable factor and the quantity for the price. It does leave a bad aftertaste in the mouth, but that is true for all of the chewable melatonin and vitamins I've ever had.
ReviewTitle: Not as strong as Spring Valley

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Description says the product is “natural” and  “clean”, drug and sugar free, but it contains sucralose and xylitol as well as Crospovidone. I had a bad allergic reaction to this product. It burned my throat and gave me heart palpitations. I did not sleep and I felt very out of sorts the next day.  I should have paid more attention to the ingredients, especially since it’s non returnable which I did not know.
ReviewTitle: NOT “Natural” or “Clean” as claimed - chemical reaction

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Was excited to try this product took one the first time I got them did sleep really well. I don’t know if I was just extra tired that day or not but after that first night they haven’t worked at all for me last night. I literally ate six of those things and I still couldn’t sleep so I will not be buying again.
ReviewTitle: Worked the first night ( or maybe I was just tired)

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I was taking this nightly and soon experienced diarrhea. Googled it and quickly discovered that Melatonon can cause this. Also concerning is the non-active ingredient Xilitol which can ALSO cause diarrhea as well as (they think) heart attacks and strokes. Frankly, I wasn't getting much relief from my insomnia with this product anyway.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I’ve used this brand for quite a while, and I’m sleeping much better.  According to my Apple Watch, I’m also getting much more REM sleep than before I started using it.  The pills are a pleasant flavor and dissolve very quickly, which makes them effective much quicker than other brands. The quick-dissolve has another added benefit —there is no need for a drink.  They readily dissolve on your tongue, so, should you awaken in the night and need another pill, you needn’t even get out of bed for a drink. Therefore, it’s much easier to get back to sleep.  I have been on many prescription sleep aids, and I’ve found that this natural alternative works just as well and is likely much-healthier for me.  The effect seems to last about 6-8 hours for me.  I would definitely recommend this brand over others I’ve tried and certainly before trying a prescription medication.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I'm not sure how much melatonin is too much melatonin.  Your body produces less than 1 mg per day and most experts recommend no more than 10 mg a day as a supplement, so 20 mg may be too much.  But.  I have taken up to 40 mg a day with no side effects other than unusually vivid dreams (a phenom noted by other high-dosage users).  You should start off by seeking your doctor's advice, then ramp up slowly from one or two mg a night.  The effect can be powerful, so be cautious and act slowly.  A good night's sleep is a wonderful thing, but you definitely don't want to go 'over center.' with this drug.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Ahh, 2020 (annnnd 2021). Not great years for sleep. So, I've taken to testing just about every sleep aid Amazon will put up for review. Melatonin is one of my favorites so far. So I've tested this Nature's Perfect Night brand Melatonin quick dissolve tab. At time of review a bottle of 180 tablets are $14.99 making a dose around 8 cents and a bottle that can last you 180 days (or more if you split the tablets).These are small "berry" flavored tablets that you allow to melt in the mouth (to allow quicker absorption). They are a bit grainy and not the best tasting but they aren't terrible. Now usually a minimum of 5mg works best for me, this is 4x that. Did it work faster than a 5mg? No, I don't believe it does but it might hit a little heavier than just 5. If you get less than 8 hours you might feel a little groggy if you're not used to a high dose (I was just a little but you can always split a tab for less mg). It works exactly as it should and this bottle is a great value for as many as you get.

The pills are a pleasant flavor and dissolve very quickly, which makes them effective much quicker than other brands. The quick-dissolve has another added benefit —there is no need for a drink.  They readily dissolve on your tongue, so, should you awaken in the night and need another pill, you needn’t even get out of bed for a drink. Therefore, it’s much easier to get back to sleep.  I have been on many prescription sleep aids, and I’ve found that this natural alternative works just as well and is likely much-healthier for me.  The effect seems to last about 6-8 hours for me.  I would definitely recommend this brand over others I’ve tried and certainly before trying a prescription medication.

I think this pill works different with different people. I would recommend them but idk if it would work for everyone. ALSO the flavor is ahhh okay. ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I'm not sure how much melatonin is too much melatonin.  Your body produces less than 1 mg per day and most experts recommend no more than 10 mg a day as a supplement, so 20 mg may be too much.  But.  I have taken up to 40 mg a day with no side effects other than unusually vivid dreams (a phenom noted by other high-dosage users).  You should start off by seeking your doctor's advice, then ramp up slowly from one or two mg a night.  The effect can be powerful, so be cautious and act slowly.  A good night's sleep is a wonderful thing, but you definitely don't want to go 'over center.' with this drug.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Ahh, 2020 (annnnd 2021). Not great years for sleep. So, I've taken to testing just about every sleep aid Amazon will put up for review. Melatonin is one of my favorites so far. So I've tested this Nature's Perfect Night brand Melatonin quick dissolve tab. At time of review a bottle of 180 tablets are $14.99 making a dose around 8 cents and a bottle that can last you 180 days (or more if you split the tablets).These are small "berry" flavored tablets that you allow to melt in the mouth (to allow quicker absorption). They are a bit grainy and not the best tasting but they aren't terrible. Now usually a minimum of 5mg works best for me, this is 4x that. Did it work faster than a 5mg? No, I don't believe it does but it might hit a little heavier than just 5. If you get less than 8 hours you might feel a little groggy if you're not used to a high dose (I was just a little but you can always split a tab for less mg). It works exactly as it should and this bottle is a great value for as many as you get.
ReviewTitle: Good value on a high dose melatonin tab

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I am a frequent user of melatonin. I usually purchase higher mg gummies and based on the product,  I am out like a light throughout the night, sleeping peacefully with no side effects like feeling grogginess. I decided to give these a shot, since I like quick dissolve tablets. Plus the the price and mg were right, and they have positive reviews. I've taken them for about a week now, but I am still undecided about the effectiveness.First, I don't care for the taste. I thought they would be more berry flavored, but the flavored seems more bitter and off putting than I would like. They dissolve okay, but take longer to dissolve than I expected. The size and option to break pills is a plus.These do put me to sleep within 15-20 minutes of taking them; however,  I noticed that I don't stay sleep throughout the night. I usually wake up around 4 am. I thought it was because I was only taking 1 pill per the instructions, so I started taking 2, but still not sleeping throughout the night. Maybe my body needs to get use to these, not sure but boy waking up earlier than I want annoying - especially when I am used to sleeping up to 7 hours straight using other products. I don't feel groggy when waking, but I am definitely tired sometimes because my body isn't getting my typical hours of sleep.Hopefully the longer I take these, the better they will work to keep me asleep, but we will see. They are worth a try.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: People take melatonin for health reasons (vs just sleep)--especially when it involves dosages greater than 5-10 mg.So we don't want other things in it that are there to make it "taste better", like artificial sweeteners.And artificial sweeteners *do* raise blood sugar.I personally know people who have tested this with continuous blood glucose meters that they wear.  Even a stevia soda (e.g. Zevia) can raise blood sugar by 20 points.In any case, sucralose is basically chlorinated sugar in order to render it unrecognizable as a sugar to the body.  Does this sound like a healthy thing to you?So I'm going to consume this product (because I'm cheap and probably one bottle won't do lasting damage) and then I'm going to find a brand that doesn't pollute their own product and use that for the long term.One more thing: at 20 mg dosages or more, people are probably doing "high-dose melatonin" (HDM) for therapies like preventing cancer or the like.We typically don't CARE about taste. We are going for a specific result and just need certain dosages.So I recommend eliminating the need to make them chewable or tasty. The "juice isn't worth the squeeze."Further, sucralose has a nasty aftertaste. So if you are determined to sweeten your product, its a bad choice.Better to use monkfruit or something like that if your'e going to sweeten something up and make someone increase their sugars.At least that's a naturally occurring product whereas sucralose is engineered in a lab.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: A dose of 20 mg before bed was far too much of this product for me!! I had nightmares each of the nights I tried to use it. After doing more research, I found that I should probably have started with 5 mg. I felt ordering this strength was my fault so I did not try to return it or get a refund.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Description says the product is “natural” and  “clean”, drug and sugar free, but it contains sucralose and xylitol as well as Crospovidone. I had a bad allergic reaction to this product. It burned my throat and gave me heart palpitations. I did not sleep and I felt very out of sorts the next day.  I should have paid more attention to the ingredients, especially since it’s non returnable which I did not know.
ReviewTitle: NOT “Natural” or “Clean” as claimed - chemical reaction

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: About a week of using them.The melatonin didn't do anything for me which is a shame because it was a very good deal for the amount they give you. I was trying to use these to fix my sleep schedule and at first I was daunted by the amount of mg, but as I said, didn't feel like it had an effect.I want to still give it a chance before returning and trying another because maybe it's just me relying too heavily on it.
ReviewTitle: Didn't do anything for me. Initial placebo effect

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: This is definitely not a fast dissolving tablet it takes about five minutes to dissolve. The tate has a bad aftertaste so make sure you have something to wash it down with. ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I was taking this nightly and soon experienced diarrhea. Googled it and quickly discovered that Melatonon can cause this. Also concerning is the non-active ingredient Xilitol which can ALSO cause diarrhea as well as (they think) heart attacks and strokes. Frankly, I wasn't getting much relief from my insomnia with this product anyway.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I am a frequent user of melatonin. I usually purchase higher mg gummies and based on the product,  I am out like a light throughout the night, sleeping peacefully with no side effects like feeling grogginess. I decided to give these a shot, since I like quick dissolve tablets. Plus the the price and mg were right, and they have positive reviews. I've taken them for about a week now, but I am still undecided about the effectiveness.First, I don't care for the taste. I thought they would be more berry flavored, but the flavored seems more bitter and off putting than I would like. They dissolve okay, but take longer to dissolve than I expected. The size and option to break pills is a plus.These do put me to sleep within 15-20 minutes of taking them; however,  I noticed that I don't stay sleep throughout the night. I usually wake up around 4 am. I thought it was because I was only taking 1 pill per the instructions, so I started taking 2, but still not sleeping throughout the night. Maybe my body needs to get use to these, not sure but boy waking up earlier than I want annoying - especially when I am used to sleeping up to 7 hours straight using other products. I don't feel groggy when waking, but I am definitely tired sometimes because my body isn't getting my typical hours of sleep.Hopefully the longer I take these, the better they will work to keep me asleep, but we will see. They are worth a try.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: They worked fine at the beginning and knocked me out in about an hour. A few days later it takes two hours (taking 5 x 20 = 100mg) and I could not say if the pills are hitting me or falling asleep naturally.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Just got them today, and even if they work, I will not buy again. They dissolve ok, I guess but taste so bad they don't resolve quick enough! I'm sure some will be fine with the taste, but I can't be.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Unfortunately, the pills did not work for me. I did not get any extra sleep or feel a difference but each one of us is different and I wouldn’t want to discourage someone from trying them because of the good reviews it has gotten so I may try them again, but right now, Am going to wait

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: People take melatonin for health reasons (vs just sleep)--especially when it involves dosages greater than 5-10 mg.So we don't want other things in it that are there to make it "taste better", like artificial sweeteners.And artificial sweeteners *do* raise blood sugar.I personally know people who have tested this with continuous blood glucose meters that they wear.  Even a stevia soda (e.g. Zevia) can raise blood sugar by 20 points.In any case, sucralose is basically chlorinated sugar in order to render it unrecognizable as a sugar to the body.  Does this sound like a healthy thing to you?So I'm going to consume this product (because I'm cheap and probably one bottle won't do lasting damage) and then I'm going to find a brand that doesn't pollute their own product and use that for the long term.One more thing: at 20 mg dosages or more, people are probably doing "high-dose melatonin" (HDM) for therapies like preventing cancer or the like.We typically don't CARE about taste. We are going for a specific result and just need certain dosages.So I recommend eliminating the need to make them chewable or tasty. The "juice isn't worth the squeeze."Further, sucralose has a nasty aftertaste. So if you are determined to sweeten your product, its a bad choice.Better to use monkfruit or something like that if your'e going to sweeten something up and make someone increase their sugars.At least that's a naturally occurring product whereas sucralose is engineered in a lab.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I’ve used this brand for quite a while, and I’m sleeping much better.  According to my Apple Watch, I’m also getting much more REM sleep than before I started using it.  The pills are a pleasant flavor and dissolve very quickly, which makes them effective much quicker than other brands. The quick-dissolve has another added benefit —there is no need for a drink.  They readily dissolve on your tongue, so, should you awaken in the night and need another pill, you needn’t even get out of bed for a drink. Therefore, it’s much easier to get back to sleep.  I have been on many prescription sleep aids, and I’ve found that this natural alternative works just as well and is likely much-healthier for me.  The effect seems to last about 6-8 hours for me.  I would definitely recommend this brand over others I’ve tried and certainly before trying a prescription medication.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I have attempted to ease my insomnia and irregular sleep patterns with various other brands of melatonin, and I can confidently say that Nature's Perfect Night stands out as the most effective option. These sublingual tablets are particularly noteworthy for their pleasant berry flavor, which sets them apart from other melatonin products that often have an unpleasant taste. Additionally, I appreciate the fact that they are vegan, non-GMO, sugar-free, gluten-free, drug-free, and free from most common food allergens. The tablets are conveniently scored, allowing for easy breakage in half if a lower dosage than 20mg is preferred. I sincerely hope that this review proves beneficial to you!
ReviewTitle: I can't say enough great things about this brand of melatonin!

ReviewContent: Right on the front of the bottle it is written "Quick Dissolve."  So I took a pill and let it quickly dissolve in my mouth.  Afterwards, I washed my own mouth out with Lifebuoy Soap.I learned quickly: don't let it dissolve in your mouth.

ReviewContent: Is very good getting me relaxed and sleeping the hours I need.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I am a frequent user of melatonin. I usually purchase higher mg gummies and based on the product,  I am out like a light throughout the night, sleeping peacefully with no side effects like feeling grogginess. I decided to give these a shot, since I like quick dissolve tablets. Plus the the price and mg were right, and they have positive reviews. I've taken them for about a week now, but I am still undecided about the effectiveness.First, I don't care for the taste. I thought they would be more berry flavored, but the flavored seems more bitter and off putting than I would like. They dissolve okay, but take longer to dissolve than I expected. The size and option to break pills is a plus.These do put me to sleep within 15-20 minutes of taking them; however,  I noticed that I don't stay sleep throughout the night. I usually wake up around 4 am. I thought it was because I was only taking 1 pill per the instructions, so I started taking 2, but still not sleeping throughout the night. Maybe my body needs to get use to these, not sure but boy waking up earlier than I want annoying - especially when I am used to sleeping up to 7 hours straight using other products. I don't feel groggy when waking, but I am definitely tired sometimes because my body isn't getting my typical hours of sleep.Hopefully the longer I take these, the better they will work to keep me asleep, but we will see. They are worth a try.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: The sealed bottle I received has only 125 tablets, not 180 as indicated in the description.Update: The seller offered a complete refund for their mistake. I tried the product and it works as advertised.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: At 20mg per tablet, these quick-dissolving wonders pack a powerful punch. The tablets are cleverly scored, allowing you to easily snap them in half for a gentler 10mg dose. This flexibility is amazing - I started with the smaller dose and gradually increased based on my needs. And guess what? It works! I now fall asleep faster, and my sleep feels deeper and more restful.Value for Money: With 180 tablets per bottle, this product offers a massive amount of melatonin for a surprisingly affordable price. I'm talking months of restful nights without breaking the bank! Compared to other brands I've tried, Nature's Perfect Night delivers exceptional value. The tablets are sugar-free, vegan, and gluten-free, making them suitable for various dietary needs.Bonus Points: The natural mixed berry flavor? It's pleasant! No chalky aftertaste here - just a gentle sweetness that dissolves quickly on the tongue. Plus, the convenience of quick-dissolving tablets is amazing. No need for water, just pop it in your mouth and drift off peacefully.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size

ReviewContent: When I take this, I stay asleep through fire alarms, dogs barking, children screaming, and neighbors shooting each other. 5/5It's grape flavored but in a Flintstone vitamin sort of way, helps with warning me I shouldn't take more than one unless I want adverse effects to take place. 5/5Acts very slow but it's a stable lull to sleep. ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I've tried many many melatonin pills,including gummies. I needed some for back to school since I have such a hard time falling to sleep. ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I'm not sure how much melatonin is too much melatonin.  Your body produces less than 1 mg per day and most experts recommend no more than 10 mg a day as a supplement, so 20 mg may be too much.  But.  I have taken up to 40 mg a day with no side effects other than unusually vivid dreams (a phenom noted by other high-dosage users).  You should start off by seeking your doctor's advice, then ramp up slowly from one or two mg a night.  The effect can be powerful, so be cautious and act slowly.  A good night's sleep is a wonderful thing, but you definitely don't want to go 'over center.' with this drug.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: People take melatonin for health reasons (vs just sleep)--especially when it involves dosages greater than 5-10 mg.So we don't want other things in it that are there to make it "taste better", like artificial sweeteners.And artificial sweeteners *do* raise blood sugar.I personally know people who have tested this with continuous blood glucose meters that they wear.  Even a stevia soda (e.g. Zevia) can raise blood sugar by 20 points.In any case, sucralose is basically chlorinated sugar in order to render it unrecognizable as a sugar to the body.  Does this sound like a healthy thing to you?So I'm going to consume this product (because I'm cheap and probably one bottle won't do lasting damage) and then I'm going to find a brand that doesn't pollute their own product and use that for the long term.One more thing: at 20 mg dosages or more, people are probably doing "high-dose melatonin" (HDM) for therapies like preventing cancer or the like.We typically don't CARE about taste. We are going for a specific result and just need certain dosages.So I recommend eliminating the need to make them chewable or tasty. The "juice isn't worth the squeeze."Further, sucralose has a nasty aftertaste. So if you are determined to sweeten your product, its a bad choice.Better to use monkfruit or something like that if your'e going to sweeten something up and make someone increase their sugars.At least that's a naturally occurring product whereas sucralose is engineered in a lab.

I have been on many prescription sleep aids, and I’ve found that this natural alternative works just as well and is likely much-healthier for me.  The effect seems to last about 6-8 hours for me. ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I am a frequent user of melatonin. I usually purchase higher mg gummies and based on the product,  I am out like a light throughout the night, sleeping peacefully with no side effects like feeling grogginess. I decided to give these a shot, since I like quick dissolve tablets. Plus the the price and mg were right, and they have positive reviews. I've taken them for about a week now, but I am still undecided about the effectiveness.First, I don't care for the taste. I thought they would be more berry flavored, but the flavored seems more bitter and off putting than I would like. They dissolve okay, but take longer to dissolve than I expected. The size and option to break pills is a plus.These do put me to sleep within 15-20 minutes of taking them; however,  I noticed that I don't stay sleep throughout the night. I usually wake up around 4 am. I thought it was because I was only taking 1 pill per the instructions, so I started taking 2, but still not sleeping throughout the night. Maybe my body needs to get use to these, not sure but boy waking up earlier than I want annoying - especially when I am used to sleeping up to 7 hours straight using other products. I don't feel groggy when waking, but I am definitely tired sometimes because my body isn't getting my typical hours of sleep.Hopefully the longer I take these, the better they will work to keep me asleep, but we will see. They are worth a try.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size

ReviewContent: At 20mg per tablet, these quick-dissolving wonders pack a powerful punch. The tablets are cleverly scored, allowing you to easily snap them in half for a gentler 10mg dose. This flexibility is amazing - I started with the smaller dose and gradually increased based on my needs. And guess what? It works! I now fall asleep faster, and my sleep feels deeper and more restful.Value for Money: With 180 tablets per bottle, this product offers a massive amount of melatonin for a surprisingly affordable price. I'm talking months of restful nights without breaking the bank! Compared to other brands I've tried, Nature's Perfect Night delivers exceptional value. The tablets are sugar-free, vegan, and gluten-free, making them suitable for various dietary needs.Bonus Points: The natural mixed berry flavor? It's pleasant! No chalky aftertaste here - just a gentle sweetness that dissolves quickly on the tongue. Plus, the convenience of quick-dissolving tablets is amazing. No need for water, just pop it in your mouth and drift off peacefully.

ReviewContent: I'm not sure how much melatonin is too much melatonin.  Your body produces less than 1 mg per day and most experts recommend no more than 10 mg a day as a supplement, so 20 mg may be too much.  But.  I have taken up to 40 mg a day with no side effects other than unusually vivid dreams (a phenom noted by other high-dosage users).  You should start off by seeking your doctor's advice, then ramp up slowly from one or two mg a night.  The effect can be powerful, so be cautious and act slowly.  A good night's sleep is a wonderful thing, but you definitely don't want to go 'over center.' with this drug.

ReviewContent: It’s been a game changer for helping me fall asleep quicker and stay asleep. ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: People take melatonin for health reasons (vs just sleep)--especially when it involves dosages greater than 5-10 mg.So we don't want other things in it that are there to make it "taste better", like artificial sweeteners.And artificial sweeteners *do* raise blood sugar.I personally know people who have tested this with continuous blood glucose meters that they wear.  Even a stevia soda (e.g. Zevia) can raise blood sugar by 20 points.In any case, sucralose is basically chlorinated sugar in order to render it unrecognizable as a sugar to the body.  Does this sound like a healthy thing to you?So I'm going to consume this product (because I'm cheap and probably one bottle won't do lasting damage) and then I'm going to find a brand that doesn't pollute their own product and use that for the long term.One more thing: at 20 mg dosages or more, people are probably doing "high-dose melatonin" (HDM) for therapies like preventing cancer or the like.We typically don't CARE about taste. We are going for a specific result and just need certain dosages.So I recommend eliminating the need to make them chewable or tasty. The "juice isn't worth the squeeze."Further, sucralose has a nasty aftertaste. So if you are determined to sweeten your product, its a bad choice.Better to use monkfruit or something like that if your'e going to sweeten something up and make someone increase their sugars.At least that's a naturally occurring product whereas sucralose is engineered in a lab.

They readily dissolve on your tongue, so, should you awaken in the night and need another pill, you needn’t even get out of bed for a drink. Therefore, it’s much easier to get back to sleep.  I have been on many prescription sleep aids, and I’ve found that this natural alternative works just as well and is likely much-healthier for me.  The effect seems to last about 6-8 hours for me.  I would definitely recommend this brand over others I’ve tried and certainly before trying a prescription medication.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I'm not sure how much melatonin is too much melatonin.  Your body produces less than 1 mg per day and most experts recommend no more than 10 mg a day as a supplement, so 20 mg may be too much.  But.  I have taken up to 40 mg a day with no side effects other than unusually vivid dreams (a phenom noted by other high-dosage users).  You should start off by seeking your doctor's advice, then ramp up slowly from one or two mg a night.  The effect can be powerful, so be cautious and act slowly.  A good night's sleep is a wonderful thing, but you definitely don't want to go 'over center.' with this drug.

ReviewContent: I’ve used this brand for quite a while, and I’m sleeping much better.  According to my Apple Watch, I’m also getting much more REM sleep than before I started using it.  The pills are a pleasant flavor and dissolve very quickly, which makes them effective much quicker than other brands. The quick-dissolve has another added benefit —there is no need for a drink.  They readily dissolve on your tongue, so, should you awaken in the night and need another pill, you needn’t even get out of bed for a drink. Therefore, it’s much easier to get back to sleep.  I have been on many prescription sleep aids, and I’ve found that this natural alternative works just as well and is likely much-healthier for me.  The effect seems to last about 6-8 hours for me.  I would definitely recommend this brand over others I’ve tried and certainly before trying a prescription medication.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I'm not sure how much melatonin is too much melatonin.  Your body produces less than 1 mg per day and most experts recommend no more than 10 mg a day as a supplement, so 20 mg may be too much.  But.  I have taken up to 40 mg a day with no side effects other than unusually vivid dreams (a phenom noted by other high-dosage users).  You should start off by seeking your doctor's advice, then ramp up slowly from one or two mg a night.  The effect can be powerful, so be cautious and act slowly.  A good night's sleep is a wonderful thing, but you definitely don't want to go 'over center.' with this drug.

ReviewContent: It’s been a game changer for helping me fall asleep quicker and stay asleep. It dissolves in your mouth or can be crunched—it’s not a regular hard pill, which is useful if you want to crush it up and put it in something, especially for a child. The dosage is high—note that 20mg is about the highest recommended—so these pills are helpfully designed to easily break in half if you want to take only 10mg. (And, if you do that, the 180 pill bottle will last you almost a whole year.)One “side effect” from experience has been that it results in more vivid dreams and dream recall after waking up.

ReviewContent: I slept the longest I have in quite some time.  Next morning I can not keep my eyes open, they burn also. Not sleepy, burning eyes very bad.  I have to keep shaking my head to feel as if I can focus. I am not having issues with focus just feels that way.  Every 2 or 3 seconds I have to shake my head to relieve the feeling.  Now I am getting a headache from all the head shaking. So I have to see how long this goes on I have been awake 2 hrs.. If this is an all day thing I will not continue to take this even though I slept better than I have in a long time.  I can't get much done.  Hopefully this is a short term affect. I may try taking a little off and try to get closer to 15mlg. Other than that slept like a baby.
ReviewTitle: Great for sleep, next day not so great on my eyes.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I've tried many many melatonin pills,including gummies. I needed some for back to school since I have such a hard time falling to sleep. Instead of going to the store I decided to buy some from Amazon. I landed on these because I got more pills for less money. Some of the reviews impressed me but I was still worried that I wouldn't like them. I still ordered them anyway. Im so glad i did. Actually wow, like wow! I've used these for a week and I swear by 9 I'm out. I've never slept better in my life! I LOVE THEM! Gonna repurchase! ONE THING I WOULD SAY - my littler siblings have hard time sleeping too so I split a pill for them. (they eat usually the gummy ones) For them it took a couple days for them to adjust. For the first couple of nights they did not sleep well, honestly worse. They stayed up all night. But after a couple days it worked on them like me. I think this pill works different with different people. I would recommend them but idk if it would work for everyone. ALSO the flavor is ahhh okay. I just chewed them quickly and swallowed them but they don't taste that bad, just very strong grape.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I am a frequent user of melatonin. I usually purchase higher mg gummies and based on the product,  I am out like a light throughout the night, sleeping peacefully with no side effects like feeling grogginess. I decided to give these a shot, since I like quick dissolve tablets. Plus the the price and mg were right, and they have positive reviews. I've taken them for about a week now, but I am still undecided about the effectiveness.First, I don't care for the taste. I thought they would be more berry flavored, but the flavored seems more bitter and off putting than I would like. They dissolve okay, but take longer to dissolve than I expected. The size and option to break pills is a plus.These do put me to sleep within 15-20 minutes of taking them; however,  I noticed that I don't stay sleep throughout the night. I usually wake up around 4 am. I thought it was because I was only taking 1 pill per the instructions, so I started taking 2, but still not sleeping throughout the night. Maybe my body needs to get use to these, not sure but boy waking up earlier than I want annoying - especially when I am used to sleeping up to 7 hours straight using other products. I don't feel groggy when waking, but I am definitely tired sometimes because my body isn't getting my typical hours of sleep.Hopefully the longer I take these, the better they will work to keep me asleep, but we will see. They are worth a try.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: They worked fine at the beginning and knocked me out in about an hour. A few days later it takes two hours (taking 5 x 20 = 100mg) and I could not say if the pills are hitting me or falling asleep naturally.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: Just got them today, and even if they work, I will not buy again. They dissolve ok, I guess but taste so bad they don't resolve quick enough! I'm sure some will be fine with the taste, but I can't be.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: I am a frequent user of melatonin. I usually purchase higher mg gummies and based on the product,  I am out like a light throughout the night, sleeping peacefully with no side effects like feeling grogginess. I decided to give these a shot, since I like quick dissolve tablets. Plus the the price and mg were right, and they have positive reviews. I've taken them for about a week now, but I am still undecided about the effectiveness.First, I don't care for the taste. I thought they would be more berry flavored, but the flavored seems more bitter and off putting than I would like. They dissolve okay, but take longer to dissolve than I expected. The size and option to break pills is a plus.These do put me to sleep within 15-20 minutes of taking them; however,  I noticed that I don't stay sleep throughout the night. I usually wake up around 4 am. I thought it was because I was only taking 1 pill per the instructions, so I started taking 2, but still not sleeping throughout the night. Maybe my body needs to get use to these, not sure but boy waking up earlier than I want annoying - especially when I am used to sleeping up to 7 hours straight using other products. I don't feel groggy when waking, but I am definitely tired sometimes because my body isn't getting my typical hours of sleep.Hopefully the longer I take these, the better they will work to keep me asleep, but we will see. They are worth a try.

ProductTitle: Nature's Perfect Night | Melatonin 20mg | 180 Quick Dissolve Tablets | Natural Mixed Berry Flavor |High Potency | Sugar Free | Vegan | Gluten Free | Value Size
ReviewContent: They worked fine at the beginning and knocked me out in about an hour. A few days later it takes two hours (taking 5 x 20 = 100mg) and I could not say if the pills are hitting me or falling asleep naturally.
